data.description:
## Overview
Protobuf was planned for cross-language serialization but is no longer needed. GoT handles all persistence needs. Remove protobuf to reduce complexity.

## Files to Remove
- `cortical/projects/proto/` directory (entire package)
  - `__init__.py` (909 bytes)
  - `serialization.py` (3618 bytes)
  - `tests/test_serialization.py`

## Files to Update
- `pyproject.toml`: Remove protobuf from optional dependencies
- `requirements.txt`: Remove protobuf if present
- `.github/workflows/ci.yml`: Remove protobuf test steps
- `tests/unit/test_got_modules.py`: Remove protobuf-related tests
- `CLAUDE.md`: Remove protobuf references in test markers section

## Also Remove
- filterwarnings exception in pyproject.toml for protobuf deprecation warnings
- Any skip decorators for protobuf tests

## Verification
```bash
grep -r 'protobuf|proto' cortical/ tests/ --include='*.py'
python -m pytest tests/ -v  # Should pass without protobuf
```
data.title: Remove protobuf package and related code from repository
